entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:01 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 02:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
Temperature: -6.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -9.5°C
Wind: WSW 39 km/h gust 56 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 4. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
